    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584

          text run at (290,0) width 228: "If you see any red, the test has failed. "

          text run at (0,20) width 494: "boxes will shift to avoid floats that try to intrude into their space (just as tables do)."
